titles.title: A resolution referring the bill (H.R.1192) for the relief of Harold N. Holt to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Refers H.R. 1192, a bill for the relief of a named individual, to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court.
